009
010package imagingbook.pub.corners;
011
012import static imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015
016/**
017 * This is an implementation of the Harris corner detector, as described in
018 * <blockquote>
019 *  C. G. Harris and M. Stephens. A combined corner and edge
020 *  detector. In C. J. Taylor, editor, 4th Alvey Vision Conference,
021 *  pp. 147â€“151, Manchester (1988).
022 *  </blockquote>
023 * This class extends {@link GradientCornerDetector} (where most
024 * of the work is done) by defining a specific corner score function
025 * and associated threshold.
026 *
027 * @author W. Burger
028 * @version 2021/10/08
029 */
030public class HarrisCornerDetector extends GradientCornerDetector {
031        
032        public static double DEFAULT_THRESHOLD = 20000;
033
034        public static class Parameters extends GradientCornerDetector.Parameters {
035                /** Sensitivity parameter */
036                public double alpha = 0.05;
037                
038                public Parameters() {
039                        scoreThreshold = DEFAULT_THRESHOLD;     // individual default threshold
040                }
041        }
042        
043        private final float alphaF;
044
045        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
046        
047        public HarrisCornerDetector(ImageProcessor ip, Parameters params) {
048                super(ip, params);
049                this.alphaF = (float) params.alpha;
050        }
051        
052        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
053
054        @Override
055        protected float getCornerScore(float a, float b, float c) {
056                float det = a * b - sqr(c);
057                float trace = a + b;
058                return det - alphaF * sqr(trace);
059        }
060        
061}
